ComicInfo.Title: Fit the Fourth: Ladies Night
ComicInfo.Summary: Roger Langridge — the Harvey Award winner behind THE MUPPET SHOW and THOR: THE MIGHTY AVENGER — concludes the first arc of his all new side-splitting adventure that can only be explained as…SNARKED! Journey with Langridge as he pulls the carpet out from under such Lewis Carroll classics as “The Walrus and The Carpenter,”“Through the Looking Glass,” and “The Hunting of the Snark,” creating a brand new world of humorous grandeur. Princess Scarlett, baby Rusty, and the Walrus and the Carpenter must escape the relentless royal guards — but will they make it in time to set sail on the Snarkhunter? The search for the Red King continues in the all ages adventure that has captured the hearts of young and old alike!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 22:19:09. [CVDB310550]
ComicInfo.Characters: Banker, Barrister, Beaver, Bellman, Bill the Lizard, Billiard Marker, Bonnet Maker, Broker of Goods, Butcher, Cheshire Cat, Clyde McDunk, Gryphon, Prince Rusty, Queen Scarlet, White Knight, Wilburforce J. Walrus
